replies.msg:
A trending hashtag on twitter gets a lot of traction on the internet
It needs to be posted within a short period of time in order to become a trending topic
It should be done in the morning since that's the most active internet hour in the west
com'on get it going

Even if 1% of Hong Kong people are arrested, hurt or killed, it is actually still worth freedom of expression, still worth protesting.

Everyone must take 3 steps forward!
STOP HITLER AT MUNICH. STOP XI AT HONG KONG.
